sentence.Network_en: This is a well designed easel which folds up quickly and neatly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个画架设计得很好,可以迅速而整齐地折叠起来.

sentence.Network_en: He went round from easel to easel.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一个画架一个画架来回转悠.

sentence.Network_en: I took it from the easel and held it up to the windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把画从画架上取下来,把它举到窗户前.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Dutch ezel 'ass'. The word ‘horse’ is used in English in a similar way to denote a supporting frame

entry.def: An easel is a wooden frame that supports a picture which an artist is painting or drawing.

means.word_mean: 1. an upright tripod for displaying something (usually an artist's canvas)
